item.title: Semantic Operators: A Declarative Model for Rich, AI-based Analytics Over Text Data
item.description: LOTUS uses novel ‘semantic operators’ to enable declarative, AI-powered analytics over text data, achieving up to 400x speedups and exceeding state-of-the-art accuracy.
